intro: Euphrasia zelandica, commonly known as New Zealand eyebright, is a flowering plant native to New Zealand. It belongs to the Scrophulariaceae family and is characterized by its small, showy flowers that range in color from yellow to orange. The plant typically grows in damp, shaded environments such as forests and wetlands. It has narrow, lance-shaped leaves and produces numerous tiny flowers arranged in clusters. Euphrasia zelandica is often found in the undergrowth, where it thrives in cool, moist conditions.
